text: We truly appreciate all the effort the teachers put into organizing the events at Agape Compassvale. Beyond that, we’re especially grateful for the care and concern they show for our child on a daily basis, and for always keeping us updated on his progress in school. Thank you!

Agape Compassvale recently organised Mother’s day celebration in the centre. The school has frequent events and excursion great for Parents and child interaction. Teachers in Agape proactively update me on my child’s progression in school and my child seems happy to go to school everyday.

Luna had fun painting pouch for mama. But we would prefer letting the parents and kids to put on painting apron so we wouldnt dirty our specially worn outfits for the event. Last year i remembered the teachers prepared a video of the kids singing/performing a song for the mothers, it was so touching, so I hope the school can do that again. Thank you!

A Wonderful Experience at Agape

Our experience with Agape PlayGroup has been fantastic so far! Kid is always excited to go to school in the morning, which, to me, is the best testament to how great the school is. It’s comforting to know that she feels happy and secure in her learning environment.

We truly appreciate the dedication of the staff, who take such good care of the children. Their commitment to safety, learning, and overall well-being gives us great peace of mind as parents. A big thank you to the wonderful team for creating such a nurturing and positive space for the little ones!
We had a precious Mothers’ Day celebration with our children in Agape Compassvale. Thanks teachers for putting effort making this special day a wonderful one!
